page.title: 20LANGUAGE
page.content: {Wot 'appened when Cox used 'is spam to {nutta a footie over old meanies garden Me and me mates was playin Wembley when Cox done a shattoblaster over this geyzers fence. The bloke won't give our ball back so we give im aloada mouf. So edone in our ball. Then we tell im e's just busted is kids new football, 'E's well mad. {TRANSLATION { What happened when Ryan Coxall headed {a football over our neighbours fence. My friends and I were playing football when Ryan headed a ball over our neighbour's fence. He refused to return it so we were very rude to him.He retaliated by bursting our ball Then we told him he had burst his son's new ball. He was very angry with us. {This Mini_saga, a story in 50 words, {is written in the way we talk together
